New Records: Nikola Jokic had his third straight triple-double, and his NBA-best fifth of the season
Jamal Murray became the first player in Nuggets franchise history with 1,000 career 3-pointers
Key Match Events: The Nuggets outscored the Heat 40-17 in the first quarter
The Nuggets outscored the Heat 15-4 in the opening 3:03 of the third quarter
Jimmy Butler turned his ankle on a drive against Jamal Murray seven minutes into the game and did not return
Pre-Game Insights: There is no pre-game insights in the article

Denver continued its recent surge, winning for the sixth time in the past seven games after an 0-2 start
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets host the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday, the same day the Heat continue a six-game road swing at the Minnesota Timberwolves
Others: Russell Westbrook continued a strong recent stretch, dishing out a season-high 10 assists for Denver
